org.apparatus_templi

Class Prefs

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apparatus_templi.Prefs

  • public class Prefs
extends Object
    A singleton pattern that maintains a map of default preferences. Contains methods to read preferences from a Properties, to set preferences in memory, and to write preferences back to disk. from configuration file.
    Author:
    Jonathan Nelson

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Prefs.Keys
      A convenience class containing known keys that correspond to preference values.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static HashMap<String,String> DEF_PREFS 
      static HashMap<String,String> preferences

    • Field Detail

      • DEF_PREFS

        public static final HashMap<String,String> DEF_PREFS

      • preferences

        public static final HashMap<String,String> preferences

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Prefs getInstance()
        Return a reference to the Prefs singleton.

      • readPreferences

        public void readPreferences(String configFile)
        Reads all preferences from the given configFile. If the given file can not be read then the default preferences are used.
        Parameters:
        configFile -

      • getPreference

        public String getPreference(String key)
        Retuns the preferences associated with the given key.
        Parameters:
        key - the name of the preference to return. A set of keys is available for use in the Prefs.Keys class.

      • getPreferenceDesc

        public String getPreferenceDesc(String key)

      • putPreference

        public void putPreference(String key,
                 String value)
        Update the value of a preference. Updating the preference value will only update the preference resident in memory. To store the preference permanently savePreferences(HashMap) must be used.
        Parameters:
        key - the name of the preference to update. A set of keys is available for use in the Prefs.Keys class.
        value - the value of the preference.

      • getPreferencesMap

        public HashMap<String,String> getPreferencesMap()

      • savePreferences

        public boolean savePreferences(HashMap<String,String> prefs)
        Writes the given preferences back to the config file. If any preference is undefined in the given map then the default preference will be written. Keys that do not map to a known value in Prefs.Keys will also be written to the file.
        Parameters:
        prefs - a HashMap of key/value pairs to write back to the preferences file.
